ygData.subject: Re: Wis Items
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I read this too on EQ Enchanters (The guy there talks/emails regularly with GZ on spell issues) and GZ said he didn t think it helped at all but was going
ygData.messageBody:
Sean O'Brien wrote:
>
> From: "Sean O'Brien" <sobrien@...>
>
> J Hoppe wrote:
> > Reasoning, after you cast your first "real" heal (greater heal for 280+ hp)
> > most monsters will attack you. DEX will allow you to cast while being hit
> > (it helps your channeling).
> >
>
> I thought GZ stated that DEX didn't help with channeling ?
>

I read this too on EQ Enchanters (The guy there talks/emails regularly
with GZ on spell issues) and GZ said he didn't think it helped at all
but was going to check the code out in case it had some indirect way of
effecting it. The guy who runs the site did some tests and seemed to
think it did help with channelling.

Vinamin
Son of Innoruuk
Priest of The Lady
Erollisi Marr
